course_overview.course_description: This course introduces beginner learners to the innovative world of storytelling and storyboarding using generative AI, equipping them with the skills to develop compelling narratives and visual content. Participants will explore the fundamentals of storytelling, including plot, character, and setting, and learn how to integrate these elements into AI-generated content. Through hands-on exercises, learners will gain practical experience with AI tools for script generation, storyboarding, and video creation, enhancing their ability to produce engaging and original media content. The course also addresses the ethical considerations of using generative AI, teaching learners how to identify and correct bias, minimize plagiarism risks, and navigate copyright laws, ensuring they can create responsibly and ethically in the digital age. By the end of this course, learners will have a comprehensive understanding of how to leverage generative AI for media production, a skill increasingly sought after in the media industry. The course's focus on practical application and ethical practices prepares participants for job opportunities and career advancement in media, content creation, and digital marketing. With the growing demand for AI-enhanced storytelling, this course provides a valuable foundation for those looking to innovate and excel in their careers, making it an essential stepping stone for aspiring media professionals.
